sentences: Ma ei tea, miks sa n체체d nii ettevalmistuseta siia tuleksid.
Ta j채ttis oma arvamuse k천rvale ja lubas nii ette valmistada.
See on nii ette antud, et ma pean seda tegema.
context: In Estonian, 'niiet' is used to indicate a conclusion or result based on previous statements. It can be translated as 'thus', 'so', or 'therefore'. It connects ideas logically in sentences, showing that one thing follows from another.
